I'm writing this because I don't want others to feel the FRUSTRATION that other wallpaper apps give to cynical people like me.  I am VERY SPECIFIC with my phone wallpapers--I want them crisp, REALLY full hd and not just some crappy sub-quality stuff like LITERALLY ALL other wallpaper apps offer. Out of about a hundred ones I've tried, Resplash is one of the ONLY 3 WALLPAPER APPS that really delivers and that actually, truthfully, without-exception provide High Quality wallpapers. Among those only 3 that ACTUALLY provide "HD/HQ" (in the truest sense of the term), Resplash is hands-down the best.  I can't emphasize enough how this app blows every other wallpaper app into the dust bc of their sub-optimal, tasteless, mediocre wallpapers advertised as "HD" when clearly they are not lol  Please, PLEASE do yourselves a freakin' favor and don't download any other app aside from this.   You know that feeling when you are so sure about something that you are willing to bet EVERYTHING you value on the line, that's how I feel about Resplash's quality. I can ASSURE YOU, 100.00% (yeah there's not even a 0.1% room for mistake), that you CANNOT find a better Android wallpaper app than Resplash. So there, I hope I convinced you. Please let me know your thoughts afterwards.  (P.S. Only download PORTAIT photos if you'd be using them as wallpapers, so as their quality will be as close to the intended as possible. If you use landscape photos as wallpapers, you'd end up using a zoomed version of the picture, which would then produce non-HD pic in most cases.)
